original_text: The whole Israelite community set out from Elim and came to the Desert of Sin, which is between Elim and Sinai, on the fifteenth day of the second month after they had come out of Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 엘림에서 떠나 엘림과 시내 산 사이에 있는 신 광야에 이르니 애굽에서 나온 후 둘째 달 십오일이라

sentences.original_text: The whole Israelite community set out from Elim
and came to the Desert of Sin
which is between Elim and Sinai
on the fifteenth day of the second month
after they had come out of Egypt
